score.description: Overall score for an evaluation on a numeric scale.

min.description: Minimum value of the scale, e.g. 0 or 1.

max.description: Maximum value of the scale, e.g. 5 or 10.

value.description: Score within the inclusive range [min, max].

main.description: An evaluation of a hypercert record (e.g. an activity and its impact).

subject.description: A strong reference to what is being evaluated. (e.g activity, measurement, contribution, etc.)

attachments.description: Evaluation data (URIs or blobs) containing detailed reports or methodology

score.description: Optional overall score for this evaluation on a numeric scale.

location.description: An optional reference for georeferenced evaluations. The record referenced must conform with the lexicon app.certified.location.

createdAt.description: Client-declared timestamp when this record was originally created
